title: Mergers: Commission approves acquisition of Com Hem by Tele2
snippet: The European Commission has approved unconditionally, under the EU Merger Regulation, the proposed acquisition of Com Hem by Tele2. The Commission concluded that the transaction would raise no competition concerns as the companies\' activities ...

title: Tele2 2025 Company Profile: Stock Performance & Earnings | PitchBook
snippet: Tele2 was a pure mobile operator until 2018 when it acquired Com Hem, Sweden's largest cable company. Tele2 is also present in the Baltic markets, where it runs a pure mobile business.

title: Tele2 - Wikipedia
snippet: On 1 December 2025, Tele2 and Telenor, through Net4Mobility, will begin shutting down the 2G network. The phase-out coincides with the ongoing decommissioning of the 3G network, freeing up spectrum for newer mobile technologies.

title: The European Commission has approved the merger of Tele2 and Com Hem - Inderes
snippet: Today the European Commission approved the merger of Tele2 and Com Hem unconditionally. The merger will combine two highly cash generative businesses with clear synergies to create a leading...

title: Tele2 closes Com Hem acquisition - Mobile World Live
snippet: At the time, Kirkby said the final quarter before closing the acquisition was again one “of solid business trends”, adding the Com Hem deal will take Tele2’s “customer-focussed strategy” to a higher level.
